text: Question regarding Marketplace themes.  If you purchase and clone a theme what is the proper procedure to update the clone when the original theme gets updated by its developer? Cloned themes are not child or subthemes of the master so every file has been copied to the clone whether any modification has been made to it or not.
Pretty sure you have to manually merge this in. I may be incorrect though.
OK so pull a local copy of both. Merge new into old and push back.
